link.description: Subjects pave the way for a groundbreaking approach in decentralized application design. They represent modular units that encapsulate behavior, state, and logic, offering a seamless blend of reusability and innovation. By harnessing the power of Subjects, developers can create interoperable building blocks, fostering a collaborative and efficient development ecosystem. Dive into the world of Subjects and discover a paradigm shift in the realm of decentralized application development.
